LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.label: recon calibration
LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.description: Share fire control data to friendly forces within range to improve squad shooting accuracy in short time.
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.label: precise sniping
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.description: uses built-in ballistic computer to measure extremely detailed shooting data to highly improve shooting accuracy in short time.
